data.title: Cannabis Distributors: Information on Collecting and Paying the Cannabis Excise Tax
data.excerpt: As a licensed cannabis distributor, you are required to collect the cannabis excise tax from retailers you supply with cannabis or cannabis products (cannabis).
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
